channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- GOT2000 Series GT21 model
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- GOT2000 Series GT21 model

item.title: CVE-2023-3373|2024-08-02T06:55:03.371Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- got2000%20series%20gt21%20model
item.description: Predictable Exact Value from Previous Values vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation GOT2000 Series GT21 model versions 01.49.000 and prior and GOT SIMPLE Series GS21 model versions 01.49.000 and prior allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to hijack data connections (session hijacking) or prevent legitimate users from establishing data connections (to cause DoS condition) by guessing the listening port of the data connection on FTP server and connecting to it.
